name: Hooky
description:
You’re a super student from the future sent back to the past on an important espionage mission, but your teleporter malfunctioned, and sent you to a classroom in the harshest academy in the world. In order to complete your mission, you must first escape the school while following the two absolute rules: DON’T GET SEEN. DON’T GET HEARD.

CONTROLS:

WASD to Move

Mouse to look

Shift to sprint

Q to interact

CREDITS:

Joshua Oliver

Peter Oh
